important.para: All &wb-productname; specific command can only be used from within &wb-productname;

section.title: Define a new macro - WbDefineMacro
section.para: Defines a new macro (or overwrites an existing one). This command is primarily intended for the console mode

row.entry: The name of the new macro
The name of the macro group in which the new macro should be stored
A file from which to read the macro text. If this parameter is supplied, -text is ignored
The encoding of the input file specified with the -file parameter.
If true then the new macro is a macro that is expanded while typing

section.title: Delete a macro - WbDeleteMacro
section.para: WbDeleteMacro is used to delete a macro, the macro name is passed with the command, e.g: WbDeleteMacro showData

section.title: List available macros - WbListMacros
section.para: Display the defined macros. This command is primarily intended for the console mode.
